title: Creamy spiced butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '165g finely chopped onion', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1L chicken stock', '1 (900g) butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 2cm pieces', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '120ml single cream', '2 tablespoons honey', '4 tablespoons soured cream, or to taste']
